description.value: When systems distinguish person records from roles they play, like Patient/RelatedPerson/Practitioner, then the only way to keep track of that link is through the Person.link.target reference. This notion is easily missed, and use of the extension makes systems more aware of the existence of a separate Person. Note that the extension being present is by no means a requirement in itself that a receiving system shall maintain separate Person records in the same way that the sending system does. It may however be a requirement within a certain context of use. A sending system shall populate relevant elements of the resource that this extension is on, in the exact way as systems would do that do not support this extension.

purpose.value: Support link between Person record and role records (Patient, RelatedPerson, Practitioner) more efficiently than possible with Person.link
